verifier

Interface IVerifierPlugin

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IIncrementalPlugin
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuditoriumLog, IncrementalAuditoriumLog, IncrementalAuditoriumLogFast

    public interface IVerifierPlugin
    Plugins to the verifier must implement this interface.

    When the verifier is run as a standalone application, each plugin's initialize method will be called only once near the start of the verifier's running.When the verifier is run as a module, the initialize method will be called once (in a similar fashion) but the application will gain a reference to the plugin after it is loaded, and is free to make specific API calls to the plugin as it sees fit.
    See Also:
    Verifier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(Verifier verifier)
      This method will be called from the verifier once after the plugin is constructed.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(Verifier verifier)
          throws PluginException
        This method will be called from the verifier once after the plugin is constructed.
        Parameters:
        verifier - This is the verifier instance that is constructing this plugin.
        Throws:
        PluginException - This method throws if the plugin encountered problems.
